name: moocup
tagline: A self-hosted mockup generator for product and design previews
description: Moocup is a self-hosted mockup generator allowing users to insert images into templated scenes for product previews. It supports custom assets and a lightweight UI that runs entirely in the browser.

features.title: Template Library
features.description: Choose from pre-built mockup scenes for devices, packaging, and marketing materials

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload designs and automatically fit them into template perspectives with proper scaling

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Download finished mockups as high-resolution PNG or JPG files for presentations and portfolios

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Deploy as static files with no backend requirements for simple maintenance and scaling
